title: Dragon slayer vayne too light?
body:
In the new update upon the PBE they changed dragon slayer vayne's color and texture. I like the texture and color of all skins/rebalances ever, except for DS vayne.

It kind of takes the whole dark, dragon armor badass look and makes it happier and colorful? All the other skins of the line look dark, intimidating and slightly  evil.

EDIT 1:

http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-G3e30CI9gwY/VLXRbK4XnJI/AAAAAAAAhgE/cRlihEBEhkU/s1600/dragonslayervaynecompare.jpg

http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-0sZdkE-GmJM/U1cptuGuAEI/AAAAAAAAPIU/0y1bdPrwrVM/s1600/dsbr.jpg

http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-9le84O3Xi7U/U2qK33Z298I/AAAAAAAAPwA/QstAQt8N-dg/s1600/ds2.jpg

http://riot-web-static.s3.amazonaws.com/images/news/May_2014/DSS/Dragonslayer_Lineup_Compilation.jpg

She already stood out from the line pretty badly, but I guess she killed a blue dragon? The new coloring puts her absolutely too far out of the scheme to be called a dragon slayer. Blue gill slayer, maybe?

[Couldn't find a good photo of DS Jarvan]
